#include<stdio.h>

int main()
{
    char lwr[]={0,'v','x','s','w','d','f','g','u','h','j','k','n','b','i','o',0,'e','a','r','y','c','q','z','t',0};
    char upr[]={0,'V','X','S','W','D','F','G','U','H','J','K','N','B','I','O',0,'E','A','R','Y','C','Q','Z','T',0};
    char str[100],ch;
    int i=0;
    //fflush(stdin);
    scanf("%s",str);
    while(ch=str[i++])
    {
        //ch=str[i];
        //printf("%c",str[i]);
        if(ch>='a' && ch<='z')
        {ch=lwr[ch-97];if(ch!=0)
        printf("%c",ch);}
        else if(ch>='A' && ch<='Z')
        {ch=upr[ch-65];if(ch!=0)
        printf("%c",ch);}

        //i++;
    }
    return 0;
}
